segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you recommend some materials on the World War Two ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you found a particular item from the card catalogue ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I don't think they are enough for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , maybe you can find something from the New York Times , or the Washington Post during that period .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . Thanks a lot .
segments.speaker: S2
